dhp294:1: The following explanations are according to the commentary. “Mother” is craving, “father” is conceit.
dhp294:2: The “two aristocratic kings” are eternalism and annihilationism.
dhp294:3: The “kingdom” is the senses and their objects, while the “tax collector” is relishing and lust.
dhp295:3: The five hindrances with doubt as fifth.
